== Roadmap ==

* continue to gather and guide new and enthusiastic contributors that will eventually join the team of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-hr|approved l10n members]]</nowiki>

* continue to provide support on IRC channel, mailing list and forum
* publish a series of articles to introduce users to Launchpad, reporting bugs, localization etc.
* expand knowledge base on <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-hr.org/wiki|wiki]]</nowiki>
